questions.question: Is the central carved wooden panel with floral and scrollwork detailing behind the desk present and unaltered?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the wall behind the desk has intricate carvings and a globe display reflecting a sci-fi theme; therefore, the central wooden panel originally seen in Image A with floral and scrollwork detailing has been removed and replaced with a futuristic design.

questions.question: Are the two large multi-paned windows positioned symmetrically on either side of the desk, with intact glass panes?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the environment is transformed into an ornate and integrated space without visible conventional windows; therefore, the symmetrical multi-paned windows from Image A are absent.

questions.question: Are the dark gray drapes tied back at both windows, maintaining their original folds and position?
questions.explanation: Image B does not display conventional windows with tied-back drapes as in Image A, instead presenting a cohesive steampunk design where traditional window treatments and drapes are absent.

questions.question: Is the tufted leather armchair visible on the left side of the frame, partially in view?
questions.explanation: Image B focuses on a fantastical and intricate interior with no indication of a leather armchair as seen partially in Image A; rather, it immerses in an abstract setting where standard furniture pieces like an armchair are missing.

questions.question: Is the patterned Persian-style rug placed under the desk, extending toward the foreground?
questions.explanation: The flooring in Image B is part of the integrated steampunk-themed environment, replacing any Persian-style rug visible in Image A, thus the rug from Image A is not present.

questions.question: Is the computer monitor with a silver stand and flat screen still present on the desk in its original position?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there is a technological apparatus central to the design rather than a modern computer monitor, indicating that the monitor from Image A has been replaced.

questions.question: Is the wooden radiator visible beneath the left window, aligned with the baseboard?
questions.explanation: Image B presents a fully thematic steampunk ambiance with no traditional elements like a window radiator visible in Image A; the radiator is absent.
